Class ModelRole2Home

java.lang.Object
guiRole2.ModelRole2Home
public class ModelRole2Home extends Object

Title: ModelRole2Home Class.

Description: The Role2Home Page Model. This class handles business logic for the Staff Discussion Forum, including CRUD operations on posts, filtering, searching, and permission checks.

  • Method Details

    • getFilteredPosts

      public static entityClasses.PostList getFilteredPosts(entityClasses.User user, String currentThread, String searchText)

      Method: getFilteredPosts()

      *

      Description: Grabs a list of posts from the database based on the given thread filter, search text, and current user.

      Parameters:
      user - The current User object.
      currentThread - The thread to filter by ("All", "General", "Questions", "MyPosts").
      searchText - The keywords to search for.
      Returns:
      A PostList object containing the filtered, searched, and sorted posts.
      See Also:
      • StaffCrudTest.testGetFilteredPostsByThread()
      • StaffCrudTest.testGetFilteredPostsAll()
      • StaffCrudTest.testGetFilteredPostsMyPosts()
      • StaffCrudTest.testGetFilteredPostsWithSearch()

    • canEditPost

      public static boolean canEditPost(entityClasses.Post post, String username)

      Method: canEditPost()

      *

      Description: Checks if a user can edit a specific post (only author can edit).

      * @param post The post to check. * @param username The username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the user can edit the post, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • StaffCrudTest.testCanEditPost()
      • StaffCrudTest.testCanEditPostNotAuthor()
      • StaffCrudTest.testCanEditPostDeleted()
